technologies.name: Green Chemical Production Processes
technologies.evidence: We create, produce, sell and license renewable and/or recyclable/biodegradable materials for all industries.

technologies.name: Biotechnology (focused on molecules and cells)
technologies.evidence: Belgium-based biotechnology company B4Plastics is taking a revolutionary step in sustainable innovation with the development of programmed biodegradable material for the first biodegradable drainage pipe, ‘Verdiflex’.
